thread.title: Lapan Lapan Travel Now Offers Free Bus Tickets from Ipoh to Singapore
thread.title_full: Lapan Lapan Travel Now Offers Free Bus Tickets from Ipoh to Singapore

author: prbuzz.com
title: Lapan Lapan Travel Now Offers Free Bus Tickets from Ipoh to Singapore
text:
Lapan Lapan Travel is proud to announce that they are now offering FREE bus ticket from Ipoh to Singapore and everyone interested is invited to book on Easybook.com.
The special promotion from Lapan Lapan Travel is currently offered for all bus routes that are plying from Singapore to Ipoh. The travelers can now get one free bus ticket starting from Ipoh to Singapore Resort World Sentosa every time they buy a one-way Lapan Lapan bus ticket that runs from Singapore to Ipoh. The promo has a validity period that runs to end of August 2015 and terms and conditions apply.
More and more people are now looking for the best ways to save on their bus tickets and to make things easier for all their beloved customers, Lapan Lapan Travel has launched their new promo that is guaranteed to bring such great convenience and savings to all travelers. The free bus ticket that will be given to everyone who book for a fare ticket from Singapore to Ipoh will be used for a one-way travel from Ipoh to Resort World Sentosa.
About Lapan Lapan Travel Pte Ltd
Lapan Lapan Travel Pte Ltd is the headquarter company of the entire 88 coach fleet. A Singapore-based company, Lapan Lapan Travel is situated at the Park Royal Kitchener Road. The company is known for offering a nice SVIP fleet of orange and light cyan coaches that specifically specialize in the route that runs between Ipoh, Kuala Lumpur and Singapore. Lapan Lapan Travel also has its direct branch in Jalan Bendahara, Ipoh, Perak Malaysia. As an established company, they take great pride in running their very own coaches that are acclaimed for their nice service and sheer convenience and comfort.
About Easybook.com
Since it was established in 2005, Easybook.com has been continuously providing the best online booking services for express bus tickets and luxurious coaches from Singapore to and from Malaysia within East Malaysia, peninsular Malaysia, Indonesia and Thailand. By far, Easybook.com is the largest bus booking website online that offers over 7,500 bus departures every day to all destinations in Malaysia and Singapore made easy by the one-stop portal.
